title.narrative: ADVOCACY AND COMM FOR SOCIAL CHANGE

description.narrative: Media Alliance for children's rights is established, and together with CSOs (including CSOs from Serbian-majority municipalities), is influencing public policy and demand for realization of child rights, and holding Institutions in Kosovo accountable for realization of children's rights

condition.narrative: Should contribute directly to results for children as outlined in the UNDAF, national results and/or UNICEF Strategic Plan and within the scope defined in the CPD, CPAP, OMP or other agreed upon programme documents

description.narrative: The shared value partnership for children and young people with influences, media, private sector and stakeholders has put the UNICEF Kosovo Programme in the global spotlight. | Status:On-track | As-of Date:05/02/2020

title.narrative: (NOT VALID after Dec 31 2017) ) Partnership/collaboration for policy advocacy for children is established with civic society, NGOs/CSOs, private sector or Parliament Committees
Partnerships with media institutions to strengthen media professionals
Communication platforms or networks supported by UNICEF meet quality standards for children and adolescent engagement and participation across development priorities
